imdb.plot outline: The drama series DHAMAK is based on true stories of many such survivors. Revolving around emotional traumas rather than socio-economic impacts of these bomb blasts, the dramas will bring into limelight real people coping with real losses; a daughter completely dependent on her father who dies, a young boy forced to become a police officer after his father leaves him, a wife struggling to make ends meet after her husband dies, and many such people and their emotional struggles.
imdb.title: Dhamki: The Threat
plot: How does life go on after a loved one is taken away due to bomb blasts? How does the family find strength to move on? Can they ever truly move on?

The drama series DHAMAK is based on true stories of many such survivors. Revolving around emotional traumas rather than socio-economic impacts of these bomb blasts, the dramas will bring into limelight real people coping with real losses; a daughter completely dependent on her father who dies, a young boy forced to become a police officer after his father leaves him, a wife struggling to make ends meet after her husband dies, and many such people and their emotional struggles.
